headline: M&A Has Surged. It Doesn’t Always Work Out for Buyers.
summary: Companies with bigger market caps that are doing the aquiring have historically seen their stock prices drop, research shows.

headline: Dividend Paying Stocks in Railroads: The Case for Union Pacific Corporation (UNP)
summary: Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE:UNP) is included among the 12 Best Dividend Paying Stocks to Buy Now. Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE:UNP) ranks among the largest railroad operators in the United States. Over the years, the holding company has purchased several railroads and combined them under its main subsidiary, Union Pacific Railroad. Today, its network covers 23 […]
